columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the notebook instance.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the notebook instance.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: A timestamp that shows when the notebook instance was created.

columns.name: default_code_repository
columns.description: The Git repository associated with the notebook instance as its default code repository.

columns.name: direct_internet_access
columns.description: Describes whether Amazon SageMaker provides internet access to the notebook instance.

columns.name: failure_reason
columns.description: If status is Failed, the reason it failed.

columns.name: instance_type
columns.description: The type of ML compute instance that the notebook instance is running on.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The AWS KMS key ID Amazon SageMaker uses to encrypt data when storing it on the ML storage volume attached to the instance.

columns.name: last_modified_time
columns.description: A timestamp that shows when the notebook instance was last modified.

columns.name: network_interface_id
columns.description: The network interface IDs that Amazon SageMaker created at the time of creating the instance.

columns.name: notebook_instance_lifecycle_config_name
columns.description: The name of a notebook instance lifecycle configuration associated with this notebook instance.

columns.name: notebook_instance_status
columns.description: The status of the notebook instance.

columns.name: role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role associated with the instance.

columns.name: root_access
columns.description: Whether root access is enabled or disabled for users of the notebook instance.Lifecycle configurations need root access to be able to set up a notebook instance

columns.name: subnet_id
columns.description: The ID of the VPC subnet.

columns.name: url
columns.description: The URL that you use to connect to the Jupyter notebook that is running in your notebook instance.

columns.name: volume_size_in_gb
columns.description: The size, in GB, of the ML storage volume attached to the notebook instance.

columns.name: accelerator_types
columns.description: The list of the Elastic Inference (EI) instance types associated with this notebook instance.

columns.name: additional_code_repositories
columns.description: An array of up to three Git repositories associated with the notebook instance.

columns.name: security_groups
columns.description: The IDs of the VPC security groups.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: The list of tags for the notebook instance.
